name: Project Honeypot: Winnie-the-Pooh Dating Sim
description:
ADG Slam Jam 2022 submission by Bibliomaniac314, Ardradox, Moxvallix and Nunya7

In celebration of Winnie-the-Pooh's first year in the public domain, we at team S-C-A-M-s created this unforgettable experience where you get the pleasure of going on a date with Winnie-the-Pooh! In Rundle Mall!

Why would we make this?
   1. Because we can
   2. Because its funny
   3. Because the Game Jam theme was "Oversaturation" and we decided to interpret  that abstractly and create a game that criticises the corporatocracy we currently live in and how a certain company has extended copyright to ridiculous lengths.
Oversaturated it, if you will.

WIP Wiki for the game: https://projecthoneypot.wiki
